trans-unit.source: Path to WORD parser: The indexer uses the application 'catdoc' for extracting content from WORD files. The application must be installed in this path. Otherwise leave the field empty.

alt-trans.target: Percorso del decodificatore WORD: L'indicizzatore usa l'applicazione 'catdoc' per estrarre il contenuto dai files WORD. L'applicazione deve essere installata in questo percorso. Altrimenti lascia vuoto questo campo.

trans-unit.source: Debug mode: If set, debugging information is collected during indexing and can be shown in the backend. Only for debugging since it slows down the system and fills the database with crap.

Disable Indexing in Frontend: By default pages are indexed during viewing of pages in the frontend. You can disable this features so indexing of pages is only initiated through the backend page crawler.
Enable metaphone search (sounds like): 0=disabled, 1=use internal metaphone parser, 2=use advanced doubleMetaphone parser.

Bitmask for Flags (Advanced): By this value (0-255) you can filter the importance of <title> (128), <keywords> (64) and <description> (32) content from HTML documents. By setting this to 0, none of these fields will have any importance over the other. The default value 192 means that title-tag content and meta-keywords will be flagged (and rated higher in search results)

Full Text Data Length: If set, the full text data stored will be limited to this byte length. It means you can save some database space but to the degree you cut the length down you also limit possibilities to search for sentences and the search result resume will be limited.
Ignore Extensions: List of file extensions that the external parser will ignore (despite having support for them). Comma list.
Index External HTML URLs: If set, links to external URLs will be indexed if they are of type "text/html".

Deprecated! Max TTL (hours) for indexed page: The time in hours that is the maximum age of an indexed page before it will get indexed again. Usually the index is kept consistent, therefore you won't need this feature.

Max external files to index: When external files are found on a page this number indicates how many may be indexed at that point. This prevents pages with links to many external documents to take the server down - but it may also prevent documents from being indexed.
Min TTL (hours) for indexed page: The time in hours that must pass before an indexed page can be indexed again regardless of changes on the page.

PDF parsing mode: Zero=whole file is indexed in one. Positive value indicates number of pages at a time, eg. "5" would mean 1-5,6-10,.... Negative integer would indicate (abs value) number of groups. Eg "3" groups of 10 pages would be 1-4,5-8,9-10. Range is -100 to 100.

Path to PDF parsers: The indexer uses the applications 'pdftotext' and 'pdfinfo' for extracting content from PDF files. These applications must be installed in this path. Otherwise leave the field empty.

alt-trans.target: Percorso dei decodificatori PDF: L'indicizzatore usa le applicazioni 'pdftotext' e 'pdfinfo' per estrarre il contenuto dai file PDF. Tali applicazioni devono essere installate in questo percorso. Altrimenti lascia vuoto questo campo.

trans-unit.source: Path to POWERPOINT parser: The indexer uses the application 'ppthtml' for extracting content from POWERPOINT files. The application must be installed in this path. Otherwise leave the field empty.

alt-trans.target: Percorso del decodificatore POWERPOINT: L'indicizzatore usa l'applicazione 'ppthtml' per estrarre il contenuto dai files POWERPOINT. L'applicazione deve essere installata in questo percorso. Altrimenti lascia vuoto questo campo.

trans-unit.source: Path to RTF parser: The indexer uses the application 'unrtf' for extracting content from RTF files. The application must be installed in this path. Otherwise leave the field empty.

alt-trans.target: Percorso del decodificatore RTF: L'indicizzatore usa l'applicazione 'unrtf' per estrarre il contenuto dai files RTF. L'applicazione deve essere installata in questo percorso. Altrimenti lascia vuoto questo campo.

trans-unit.source: Path to unzip: The indexer uses "unzip" to extract the contents from OpenOffice.org/Oasis OpenDocument files. The application must be installed in this path. Otherwise leave the field empty.

alt-trans.target: Percorso di unzip: L'indicizzatore usa "unzip" per estrarre il contenuto dai file OpenOffice.org/Oasis OpenDocument. L'applicazione deve essere installata in questo percorso. Altrimenti lascia vuoto questo campo.

trans-unit.source: Use "crawler" extension to index external files: When external files are found on a page they are added to the "crawler" extensions queue and indexed via the cronscript running the crawler. This eliminates problems with for example many PDF files on a page. Requires a proper configuration of the "crawler" extension.
Path to EXCEL parser: The indexer uses the application 'xlhtml' for extracting content from EXCEL files. The application must be installed in this path. Otherwise leave the field empty.

alt-trans.target: Percorso del decodificatore EXCEL: L'indicizzatore usa l'applicazione 'xlhtml' per estrarre il contenuto dai files EXCEL. L'applicazione deve essere installata in questo percorso. Altrimenti lascia vuoto questo campo.
